H0.text: Which country won the men's football gold medal at the 2012 Olympics. Brazil

H1.text: Which country won the men's football gold medal at the 2012 Olympics. Argentina

H2.text: Which country won the men's football gold medal at the 2012 Olympics. Spain

H3.text: Which country won the men's football gold medal at the 2012 Olympics. EUM

A4.text: The gold medal was won by Mexico who defeated Brazil 2–1 in the final.

A5.text: Mexico defeated Brazil 2–1 in the men's football final.
